title: Death Does Not Scare Me, Love Does
preview: The fear burns intolerably into my fingertips
detail:
The fear burns intolerably
into my fingertips,
crawling up my hands
and into my eyes.
Not knowing what to say
or how to act,
stumbling over my bones
like I do with my words.
My rattling heart
breaks my ribcage,
leaving my aching body
to melt with you.
I am falling so terribly in love.
I am scared to death.
